channel.title: Need help with a Teleport (based on insanity if that helps)
channel.description:
I want to make a dungeon teleport in magebook tab, what i already did: change the name of my telebutton to "Dungeon Teleports" Logged in and pressed button "Dungeon Teleports", so i could see in cmd what button it is in ClickButtons.java under the button case i putted this
c.getDH().sendOption2("Slayer Dungeons", More Comming soon"); under this i tried alot of things but nothing seem to connect me to second sendOption Break;
i do know how to make "Slayer Dungeons" teleports me to somwhere but, i want if you click "Slayer Dungeon" another option tab opens and says ("Slayer Dungeon 1", "Slayer Dungeon 2") and then teleport me to a dungeon so i have space in the dungeon teleport options for other dungeons, since i'm making 3 slayer caves, i wanted them in a second option chat
you can always check out my rsps, still need a helping coder, www.Tormented.be
grtz Jonas i hope someone could help me with this! thanks anyways if you'd think my project looks awsome, still need someone to assist me coding, add me on skype: j.sjegers

item.title: Need help with a Teleport (based on insanity if that helps)
item.dc:creator: @M0R3TANK1NG M0R3TANK1NG
item.description:
@M0R3TANK1NG wrote:

Well, you do something like this.

- your data.

[code]case ####:

if (c.dialogueAction == #####) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(cords, here, 0);
c.sendMessage(“Slayer dungeons, more coming soon.”);
c.getPA().closeAllWindows();[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a Teleport (based on insanity if that helps)

item.title: Need help with a Teleport (based on insanity if that helps)
item.dc:creator: @r00wns r00wns
item.description:
@r00wns wrote:

I want to make a dungeon teleport in magebook tab,
what i already did: change the name of my telebutton to “Dungeon Teleports”
Logged in and pressed button “Dungeon Teleports”, so i could see in cmd what button it is in ClickButtons.java
under the button case i putted this

c.getDH().sendOption2(“Slayer Dungeons”, More Comming soon");
under this i tried alot of things but nothing seem to connect me to second sendOption
Break;

i do know how to make “Slayer Dungeons” teleports me to somwhere
but, i want if you click “Slayer Dungeon” another option tab opens and says (“Slayer Dungeon 1”, “Slayer Dungeon 2”)
and then teleport me to a dungeon
so i have space in the dungeon teleport options for other dungeons, since i’m making 3 slayer caves, i wanted them in a second option chat

you can always check out my rsps, still need a helping coder, www.Tormented.be

grtz Jonas i hope someone could help me with this! thanks anyways
if you’d think my project looks awsome, still need someone to assist me coding, add me on skype: j.sjegers

Read full topic
